T02D2659:311a-3: sbyin sreg gi cho ga / bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2659:311a-4: sbyin sreg chen po'i rim pa ni //
T02D2659:311a-5: dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni //
T02D2659:311b-0: thab @311b khung zlum po khru do bya //
T02D2659:311b-1: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bri //
T02D2659:311b-2: yang na ma bris pa yang rung //
T02D2659:311b-3: bung shing brtsigs te sreg rdzas bsog / mchod dang gtor ma la sogs dgram //
T02D2659:311b-4: bla re bris pa'i sa phyogs su //
T02D2659:311b-5: bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste bsgom //
T02D2659:311b-6: rab tu rdzas la brab brdeg bya //
T02D2659:311b-7: me sbar me lha bskyed pa ni ;
T02D2659:311b-8: / ram las me lhar drang srong ni //
T02D2659:311b-9: bgrang phreng ril ba phyag na 'dzin //
T02D2659:311b-10: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
T02D2659:311b-11: me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog / dgang blugs zhal zas bzhes slad du //
T02D2659:311b-12: 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2659:311b-13: aom aagna ye dzva l'a ya dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02D2659:311b-14: gnyis su med par bstims pa la //
T02D2659:311b-16: bsangs te mar gyi dgang blugs dbul //
T02D2659:311b-17: mchod bstod sreg rdzas rim par dbul //
T02D2659:311b-18: de nas mchod bstod me lha ni //
T02D2659:311b-19: gshegs pa'am 'bar ba'i rnam par ro //
T02D2659:311b-20: de nas padma zla ba la //
T02D2659:311b-21: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
T02D2659:311b-22: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'dir //
T02D2659:311b-23: bdag la mchod yon bzhes nas kyang //
T02D2659:311b-24: mchod pas bdag la dgyes par mdzod //
T02D2659:311b-25: aom bigha n'anta kri ta h'um phat /
T02D2659:311b-26: thal mo sbyar la mdzub gnyis dgyed //
T02D2659:311b-27: aom ta th'a ga tongbha b'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2659:311b-29: mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni //
T02D2659:311b-30: mar dang gro dang sran ma dang ;
T02D2659:311b-31: / zho dang sman dang d'ur wa dang //
T02D2659:311b-32: ku sha yam shing me tog dang //
T02D2659:311b-33: til dang yungs kar la sogs bsreg / thams cad rgyun gcod sngags kyis bya //
T02D2659:311b-34: khyad par las su bya ba ni //
T02D2659:311b-35: til dang yungs kar dag la ni //
T02D2659:311b-36: brgya'am stong ngam khri ru bsreg / sdig sgrib sbyong ba'i las su bstan //
T02D2659:311b-37: de nas mchod bstod gtor ma gtang //
T02D2659:311b-38: bsngo dang bzod par gsol te gshegs //
T02D2659:311b-39: rdzas lhag me yi lha la dbul //
T02D2659:311b-40: mchod bstod bzod par gsol te gshegs //
T02D2659:311b-41: khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02D2659:311b-42: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D2659:311b-43: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang //
T02D2659:311b-44: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2659:311b-45: dman pa bsdu zhing aa k'a ra bzlas //
T02D2659:311b-46: ji ltar grags pa'i bkra shis brjod //
T02D2659:311b-47: me yis sbyangs pa'i nor bu bzhin //
T02D2659:311b-48: rang gi spyi bo'i gtsug tu bkur //
